tool_description: Introducing our groundbreaking API, designed to revolutionize your workflow with its cutting-edge features and lightning-fast performance. Harness the power of advanced functionality that enables rapid completion of various tasks, saving you valuable time and effort. With a myriad of unique features tailored to diverse needs, our API empowers you to accomplish tasks swiftly and efficiently. Experience unparalleled speed and versatility like never before with our API.
name: YaaraAPI
title: YaaraAPI

api_list.name: font
api_list.description: when you use this type query i give you blackpink font
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yaaraapi.p.rapidapi.com/font/YaaraAPI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yaaraapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yaaraapi.p.rapidapi.com/font/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yaaraapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
